JUDE.These people here all seem so interestin: These people here all seem so interesting.

JUDE.I bet all of their stories are just as i: I bet all of their stories are just as incredible and unbelievable as ours.

GAIUS.I have been making the rounds ever since: I have been making the rounds ever since we arrived. There are indeed no small number of colorful characters here.

GAIUS.I must say, however, some of these peopl: I must say however, some of these people have slight differences in the level of incredulosity in their stories.

GAIUS.Well, to illustrate my point, I spoke ea: Well to illustrate my point, I spoke earlier with a strange woman wearing some especially peculiar clothing.

GAIUS.Her tales were outlandish to say the lea: Her tales were outlandish to say the least. I found myself lost somewhere around the part with the peach floating in a river.

GAIUS.I believe her name was something like, \: I believe her name was something like soggy shoe, however I admit I am not certain.

JUDE.Huh. Well, I suppose the phrase \"colorf: Huh. Well I suppose the phrase colorful characters does imply the possibility of rather garish colors as well.

GAIUS.Speaking plainly, I do believe I would p: Speaking plainly, I do believe I would prefer to never speak with that one floating thing ever again.

GAIUS.It was sized similarily to Teepo, yet ut: It was sized similarily to Teepo, yet utters a horrid screech that puts even the worst of undead monsters to shame.

BIENFU.Did someone here call me? I felt my ears: Did someone here call me? I felt my ears burning, bien!

GAIUS.Jude, we must retreat, now. We are sever: Jude, we must retreat now. We are severely outmatched!

ROKUROU.That's a fair reaction. I don't think Bi: That's a fair reaction. I don't think Bienfu's voice came out all that well.

EIZEN.And why is that? He sounds perfectly nor: And why is that? He sounds perfectly normal.

ROKUROU....Are you sure you haven't had one too: Are you sure you haven't had one too many cups tonight?

There's no such thing as too many cups.

ROKUROU.Too little strength, huh? Might that be: Too little strength huh. Might that be a challenge from the almighty reaper himself?

EIZEN.You bet it is. Come on. First one on the: You bet it is. Come on. First one on the floor has to spend a few hours in a mobile game that's doomed for shutdown.

ROKUROU....Oh what the heck. I'll take you on!: ...Oh what the heck I'll take you on!

TERESA.\"Colorful\" is one way to put it, I sup: Colorful is one way to put it, I suppose.
